Articles.Content:
I might be overlooking something terribly, but how do you set controller buttons and axis? I open the input menu, go to flight, and hit the grey buttons with the arrows. There it says Current Assignment: None. I move the appropriate axis, see the text change to Current Assignment: joy0.1 and confirm by clicking Accept. I open the same menu again, and my axis is unassigned again. This is confirmed in-game, with KSP not reacting to my controller inputs at all.

What is going on there? How do I set my buttons and axis so that I can use them in-game. I am currently using the 64 bit version of KSP.
I sent this question yesterday, it might be related:

In my case, it never even shows the button as being mapped. You see the correct button displayed in the mapping menu, hit Accept, and nothing changes. I am using a bog standard Xbox 360 controller that worked wonderfully in earlier version, so I doubt anything weird is going on there.
Are you getting any errors?  The settings should be persisting so something is going wrong.

9 hours ago, sal_vager said:

Are you getting any errors?  The settings should be persisting so something is going wrong.

As in, in the error log?
In the KSP.log, output_log.txt or Player.log yes, or just open the debug window with alt+F2
